statements: SELECT * FROM stress_testing_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM stress_testing_portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT portfolio_manager FROM stress_testing_portfolio WHERE total_value > 1000000;
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_manager FROM stress_testing_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(sector_allocation) AS num_sectors FROM stress_testing_portfolio;
SELECT * FROM stress_testing_portfolio WHERE total_value > 100000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, total_value FROM stress_testing_portfolio WHERE portfolio_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT portfolio_name, SUM(total_value) AS total_assets FROM stress_testing_portfolio GROUP BY portfolio_name HAVING SUM(total_value) > 500000;
SELECT portfolio_id, sector_allocation->>'technology' AS technology_allocation FROM stress_testing_portfolio WHERE sector_allocation ? 'technology';
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_manager, jsonb_array_elements_text(sector_allocation) AS sector FROM stress_testing_portfolio WHERE portfolio_manager IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Jones');
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_type FROM Investment_Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_type FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM Investment_Portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 5000 AND investment_type = 'Bonds';
SELECT p.portfolio_name, s.stress_test_results FROM Investment_Portfolio p JOIN Scenario_Analysis s ON p.portfolio_id = s.portfolio_id WHERE s.impact_on_portfolio < -2.0;
SELECT * FROM Scenario_Analysis ORDER BY impact_on_portfolio
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT scenario_name, impact FROM scenario_analysis ORDER BY impact DESC;

SELECT portfolio_name, scenario_name FROM investment_portfolio JOIN portfolio_scenario ON investment_portfolio.portfolio_id = portfolio_scenario.portfolio_id JOIN scenario_analysis ON portfolio_scenario.scenario_id = scenario_analysis.scenario_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_scenario WHERE scenario_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM investment_portfolio ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, portfolio_name ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount FROM investment_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT scenario_name, impact FROM scenario_analysis WHERE impact < 5000;
SELECT p.portfolio_name, s.scenario_name, ps.id FROM investment_portfolio p JOIN portfolio_scenario ps ON p.portfolio_id = ps.portfolio_id JOIN scenario_analysis s ON ps.scenario_id = s.scenario_id;

SELECT portfolio_name, investment_amount, scenario_name, impact FROM investment_portfolio p JOIN portfolio_scenario ps ON p.portfolio_id = ps.portfolio_id JOIN scenario_analysis s ON ps.scenario_id = s.scenario_id WHERE investment_amount >= 5000 AND impact >= 2000 ORDER BY scenario_name ASC, investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, created_date FROM Portfolio WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Investment ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investment WHERE portfolio_id = 2;
SELECT scenario_name, total_return FROM Scenario WHERE total_return > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, created_date FROM Portfolio WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
SELECT scenario_id, scenario_name, total_return FROM Scenario ORDER BY scenario_date DESC;
SELECT investment_name, amount FROM Investment WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT q.query_name, s.scenario_name, q.query_result FROM QueryResult q JOIN Scenario s ON q.scenario_id = s.scenario_id;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_type FROM portfolios WHERE creation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, creation_date FROM portfolios ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy';
SELECT * FROM portfolios
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_type, creation_date FROM portfolios
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT scenario_name, scenario_description FROM scenarios
